en: A country mouse lived in a quiet field.
ko: 시골 생쥐는 조용한 들판에 살고 있었습니다.

en: He ate simple food every day.
One day, his cousin from the city came to visit.
ko: 어느 날, 도시에서 사는 그의 사촌이 방문했습니다.

en: The country mouse welcomed him warmly.
He offered bread and seeds for dinner.
ko: 그는 저녁 식사로 빵과 씨앗을 내놓았습니다.

en: The city mouse took a small bite.
He said, "Your food is plain."
He smiled and added, "In the city, we eat fine cheese and sweet cake."
ko: 그는 웃으며 덧붙였습니다. "도시에서는 고급 치즈와 달콤한 케이크를 먹어."

en: The country mouse was curious.
The city mouse invited him to visit.
The next day, they traveled to the city together.
ko: 다음 날, 그들은 함께 도시로 갔습니다.

en: Tall buildings rose above the streets.
ko: 높은 건물들이 거리 위로 솟아 있었습니다.

en: The city was noisy and full of people.
They reached the city mouse's home.
It was inside a big house.
ko: 그 집은 큰 건물 안에 있었습니다.

en: On the table, there was bread, cheese, cake, and fruit.
ko: 테이블 위에는 빵, 치즈, 케이크, 과일이 있었습니다.

en: The country mouse had never seen so much food.
ko: 시골 생쥐는 그렇게 많은 음식을 본 적이 없었습니다.

en: He began to eat happily.
Suddenly, a loud noise shook the room.
A cat ran into the dining room.
The two mice ran to hide in a small hole.
ko: 두 생쥐는 작은 구멍으로 도망쳐 숨었습니다.

en: They waited until the cat left.
The city mouse said, "It's safe now."
The country mouse came out slowly.
His heart was beating fast.
He said, "Your food is rich, but your life is dangerous."
ko: 그는 말했습니다. "네 음식은 풍족하지만, 네 삶은 위험해."

en: He added, "I prefer my quiet home."
ko: 그는 덧붙였습니다. "나는 조용한 내 집이 더 좋아."

en: The country mouse left the city the same day.
ko: 시골 생쥐는 그날 바로 도시를 떠났습니다.

en: He returned to his simple but peaceful life.
Today's lesson: A simple life with peace is better than a rich life with fear.
ko: 오늘의 교훈: 평화로운 단순한 삶이 두려움이 있는 부유한 삶보다 낫다.
